data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Sukma, Chhattisgarh, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sukma, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Sukma you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Sukma, Chhattisgarh, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Sukma, Chhattisgarh, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Masthi people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Sukma, Chhattisgarh, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Sukma
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Sukma are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
